title: Tesla 's net loss attributable to common stockholders 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Loss in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 7 data points.
In general Loss in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Loss in million U.S. dollars is rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The line drastically increased by 4.0 times from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 3.0 times from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 2.9 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Loss in million U.S. dollars, of value 1962.0 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Loss in million U.S. dollars, of value 74.0 was reported at Year 2013
